app.name: spyglass
app.summary: This is an Synopsys app to generate the project/TCL file of the design to run it in SpyGlass and VC SpyGlass. The App takes user inputs for the design-top name and the SpyGlass project file name: eg-: write_spyglass_proc foo run_spy.prj, where foo is the design-top and run_spy.prj is the SpyGlass Project file name. To run SpyGlass or VC SpyGlass, ensure that the required software and the licenses are available. Invoke SpyGlass using the command: spyglass -project design-top.prj. And Invoke VC Spyglass using the command: vc_static_shell -f vc_setup.tcl. Follow the steps outlined in the Product user guide.
app.display: Synopsys SpyGlass and VC SpyGlass for Lint, CDC and RDC

proc.name: write_spyglass_script
proc.summary: This proc generates the SpyGlass project file and VC SpyGlass TCL setup
